sentences.en: A jet of water poured through the windows.
sentences.cn: 一股水流从窗口喷涌而入。

sentences.en: As he talked, an airforce jet screamed over the town.
sentences.cn: 他谈话时，一架军用喷气式飞机在镇子上空呼啸而过。

sentences.en: business executives jetting around the world
sentences.cn: 乘飞机满世界跑的企业高管

sentences.en: He owns a private jet.
sentences.cn: 他拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.en: I'm still a little jet-lagged.
sentences.cn: 我还有点时差反应。

sentences.en: Jet travel is undeniably fatiguing.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑，乘飞机旅行是令人疲惫的。

sentences.en: Sending a replacement jet would have been uneconomic.
sentences.cn: 当时派一架喷气式飞机去替换的话，代价太大了。

sentences.en: Suddenly she was catapulted into his jet-set lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 突然间，她过上了他那种阔佬生活。

sentences.en: The beach itself is white sand and has little to no vegetation because of the jet blast erosion.
sentences.cn: 海滩本身是白花花的，因为飞机喷射气流的关系这里没有什么绿色植被。

sentences.en: The company laid off 65,000 workers after commercial-jet orders dried up.
sentences.cn: 商务飞机订单减少后公司精减了65,000名工人。

sentences.en: The jet arrived in Johannesburg two minutes ahead of schedule.
sentences.cn: 喷气式飞机提前两分钟到达了约翰内斯堡。

sentences.en: The jet burst into flames and plummeted to the ground.
sentences.cn: 这架喷气式飞机突然着火，急速坠地。

sentences.en: The jet entered Chinese airspace without permission.
sentences.cn: 那架喷气式飞机未经允许闯入中国领空。

sentences.en: The jet-setting couple made frequent appearances in the gossip columns.
sentences.cn: 这对穿梭于各国的富豪夫妇经常出现在八卦专栏。

sentences.en: The president will be jetting off to Germany today.
sentences.cn: 总统今天要乘喷气式飞机去德国。

sentences.en: The winter sports bring the jet set from England.
sentences.cn: 冬季运动吸引了英格兰的富豪们。

sentences.en: There was a huge bang; it sounded like a supersonic jet.
sentences.cn: 传来一声巨响，听起来像是超音速喷气式飞机的声音。

sentences.en: to clean the gas jets on the cooker
sentences.cn: 把煤气灶的气嘴擦干净

sentences.en: Two jet fighters were downed.
sentences.cn: 两架喷气式战斗机被击落。

sentences.en: Workers at the plant build the F-16 jet fighter.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂的工人建造F-16喷气式战斗机。

words.tran_cn: [流]喷射，[机]喷嘴；[航]喷气式飞机；黑玉

phrases.tran_cn: n. 煤气喷嘴口；煤气灯的火焰
喷气燃料；航空煤油；喷气式发动机燃料
等离子体射流；等离子流

trans.tran_cn: 喷嘴，喷雾，喷气式飞机，喷射流，煤玉
trans.tran_en: a fast plane with a jet engine
if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole
if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole
